description: Episode number 22 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Examines the social and economic forces that alter families and increase risks for children. Reviews research results on the effects of divorce on children, observing a Russian family on the brink of divorce. The determinants and outcomes of teen pregnancy are discussed with American teen mothers and mothers-to-be.
